    Rafael Math

    • Constructor Detail

      • JasperReport

        public JasperReport(java.lang.String reportTemplate,
                    java.lang.String url,
                    java.lang.String user,
                    java.lang.String pass,
                    java.lang.String table,
                    boolean useAdditionalTable)
        Constructor, that creates database connection and prepared statement for fast query execution.
        Parameters:
        reportTemplate - Path of report template file.
        url - URL of database.
        user - User name for database access.
        pass - Password for database access.
        table - Database table.
        useAdditionalTable - If true, additional table will be created.
